H0.text: Leaves are what most plants begin their life cycle as.

H1.text: Flowers are the stage at which most plants begin their life cycle.

H2.text: Roots are the stage at which most plants begin their life cycle.

H3.text: Seeds are what most plants begin their life cycle as.

A4.text: Seed germination is a process by which a seed embryo develops into a seedling.
